text: Isaac "Ike" Berger (November 16, 1936 – June 7, 2022)Legendary Weightlifter Isaac ‘Ike’ Berger Has Passed Away At 85 was an Israeli-born American weightlifter. He competed for the United States at the 1956, 1960 and 1964 Olympics and won one gold and two silver medals. He held eight world records (four official and four unofficial), and won the United States national title eight times.Isaac Berger. chidlovski.net Berger was born to a rabbi in Jerusalem. ==References== Category:1936 births Category:2022 deaths Category:Naturalized citizens of the United States Category:Olympic gold medalists for the United States Category:Olympic silver medalists for the United States Category:American weightlifters
